io.debezium.jdbc

Interface JdbcConnection.ConnectionFactory

  • Enclosing class:
    JdbcConnection
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
 @ThreadSafe
public static interface JdbcConnection.ConnectionFactory
    Establishes JDBC connections.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.sql.Connection connect(JdbcConfiguration config)
      Establish a connection to the database denoted by the given configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        java.sql.Connection connect(JdbcConfiguration config)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Establish a connection to the database denoted by the given configuration.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration with JDBC connection information
        Returns:
        the JDBC connection; may not be null
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is an error connecting to the database
